actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to declare that it is not the intent of the act to require or authorize standards more stringent than primary and secondary ambient air quality standards.

summary.text: Declares that it is not the intent of the Clean Air Act to require or authorize standards more stringent than primary and secondary ambient air quality standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to declare that it is not the intent of the act to require or authorize standards more stringent than primary and secondary ambient air quality standards.
